class.name: AudioEffectAmplify
class.brief_description: Adds a Amplify audio effect to an Audio bus. Increases or decreases the volume of the selected audio bus.
class.description: Increases or decreases the volume being routed through the audio bus.

members.member: Amount of amplification. Positive values make the sound louder, negative values make it quieter. Value can range from -80 to 24. Default value: [code]0[/code].
